Package edu.salle.url.maze.business

Interface MazeSolver

public interface MazeSolver
Interface to be implemented in any class responsible for solving the Maze problem with a specific approach.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Direction>
    solve(Cell[][] maze, MazeRenderer renderer)
    Method that will be relied on by the system to solve the Maze problem.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      List<Direction> solve(Cell[][] maze, MazeRenderer renderer)
      Method that will be relied on by the system to solve the Maze problem.
      Parameters:
      maze - The problem's randomly generated input, as a Cell matrix.
      renderer - A helper object that can be used to render the input and possible solutions. See MazeRenderer.
      Returns:
      The proposed solution for that input, as a list of Direction.
